badges.name: Founder
badges.description: The founders of WatermelonKatana. Thanks for being here from the start!

badges.name: Developer
badges.description: One of the official developers of WatermelonKatana. Thanks for your hard work!

badges.name: Contributor
badges.description: Contributed to WatermelonKatana in some way. Thanks for your help!

badges.name: Supporter
badges.description: Supports WatermelonKatana in some way. Thanks for your support!

badges.name: Tester
badges.description: Tested WatermelonKatana in some way. Thanks for your help!

badges.name: Moderator
badges.description: Moderates WatermelonKatana. Thanks for keeping the peace!

badges.name: Administrator
badges.description: Administers WatermelonKatana. Thanks for keeping everything running smoothly!

badges.name: Alpha Tester
badges.description: Tested WatermelonKatana during the alpha phase. Thanks for your help!

badges.name: Beta Tester
badges.description: Tested WatermelonKatana during the beta phase. Thanks for your help!

badges.name: Early Access
badges.description: Got early access to WatermelonKatana. Thanks for your support!

badges.name: Donator
badges.description: Donated money to WatermelonKatana. Thanks for your support!

badges.name: Artist
badges.description: Created art for WatermelonKatana. Thanks for your help!

badges.name: Translater
badges.description: Translated WatermelonKatana into another language. Thanks for your help!

badges.name: Streamer
badges.description: Streamed WatermelonKatana. Thanks for your support!

badges.name: YouTuber
badges.description: Made a video about WatermelonKatana. Thanks for your support!

badges.name: Community Leader
badges.description: Played a significant role in leading and engaging the WatermelonKatana community. Thanks for fostering growth!

badges.name: Event Organizer
badges.description: Organized or helped organize events for WatermelonKatana. Thanks for your effort!

badges.name: Bug Hunter
badges.description: Identified and reported bugs in WatermelonKatana. Thanks for helping improve the software!

badges.name: Community Helper
badges.description: Helped others in the community with technical or general advice. Thanks for being supportive!
